name: Divine Damage Cleric Non-Zen Arcane Archer (Cleric 12 / Wizard 1 / Arcane Archer 27)
author: Orion

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
This is definitely a powerhouse class combination, and yet, looking through the archives, looked through the ECB archives (for cleric 12+ and AA 20+ builds) and the ECB tapatalk forum, very surprised a divine might version of this class combo hasn't been posted before.

Dwarf22 has a cleric 15/wizard 1/arcane archer 24 Divine Archer, its goes dex based, base AB 53 and has a charisma score of 8.
jjjhhhlll has a cleric 16/bard 3/arcane archer 21 Charismatic Divine Archer, looks nice, goes high Cha, will have a 20% exp penalty in exchange for UMD.
Tengudor_t has a cleric 12/Bard 3/AA 27 elf Enlighted Archer, high CHA, looks nice, 20% exp penalty

In terms of the current ECB Tapatalk forum:

Hip has his cleric 12/wiz 1/AA 27 ultra AB arcane archer, goes high dex, base AB 58, cha 8
Maximillan Kane has his Cleric 15/Bard 2/AA 23 Sehaine's Finest, goes high dex, base AB 53, cha 8


I also believe Grizzled_Dwarflord's famous 'The Archer Laureate' also deserves a mention here, although its a Bard / Blackguard / AA and not a cleric, it pumps divine damage to the extreme.


Anyway for your consumption. A divine damage cleric zen non-zen arcane archer. 

Base AB 47, divine damage up to +15/hit, summons to tank, dispellable cleric buffs, divine favor for more damage, heal spell to use on teammates or yourself, greater sanctuary on scrolls (to avoid concentration checks) to get yourself out of sticky situations.

Put AA nice and high like Hip has in the end for that nice damage and ab.
